body:
Well... Let's go back through time when avicus still have that christmas decorations and mczone days. I know only 2 best topics in avicus. Can anyone tell me what are the other best topics in avicus besides the two that i mentioned? (Here are the best topics on avicus):

1. http://old.avicus.net/forums/topic/783 (show your face to the world)
3.http://old.avicus.net/forums/topic/1
4.http://old.avicus.net/forums/topic/5793(ban the person above you)
5.http://old.avicus.net/forums/topic/5799 (the cacalmarin :O)

Note: those topics made me think the good old days and also... The best topic in avicus that you've been thinking should have at least 1k or more views and a lot of good memories in it 

any more? Just tell me so i can add it here :D
